ValidationRule.description: Required field Similar incidents with this device type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: if((ISPICKVAL( CMPL123CME__Type_of_Report__c ,'Combined initial and final report') || ISPICKVAL( CMPL123CME__Type_of_Report__c ,'Final report')) && (ISPICKVAL(CMPL123CME__Whether_Manufacturer_Aware__c,'' )),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please choose the appropriate field value
